Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Class.Description: Name of the class to be used.
Class.Name: Class

Interface.Description: Name of the external function which needs to be called with the help og this description.
Interface.Name: Interface

Parameter.Description: This attribute is used to specify the parameter name/datatype and whether it is in or out for a COM Interface.

Parameters.Keywords: Amount, Bool, Boolean, Byte, Char, Currency, Date, Double, Float, Integer, Logical, Long, Long Long, Number, Scode, Short, String, Unsigned char, Unsigned Integer, Unsigned Long, Unsigned Long Long, Unsigned short, Variant, WChar

Parameter.Name: Parameter

Project.Description: Name of the project/namespace which contains the class to be used.
Project.Name: Project

Parameters.Keywords: Aggregate, Amount, Date, DateTime, Due Date, Duration, FlagSet, Logical, Long, Number, NumSet, Quantity, Rate, Rate of Exchange, String, Sys Id, Time

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
